column5: Moved this from the Ice fishing section:Anyone willing to share some tips on Ice Fishing Red Lake Ontario?Going up this weekend and looking to see what I should be bringing for baits and such.Any info would be greatly appreciated. Thanks,Shawn

minnows and lots of muscles to turn the ice auger. the weatherman is calling for 7 to 10 inches of fresh snow over the next 3 days but the weather is above the normal temps so you shouldn't freeze your butt off.
